posts.post_content: Obvious comparison to [Vault Skirge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vault Skirge). In exchange for no Phyrexian option and no artifact typing, you get...no artifact typing. posts.post_content:
Comes out turn 2, and does amazing things. In Limited, I pulled 2 of these and I was happy. Perfectly costed for what it is. A great target for scavange. A game winner in a G/B deck.  
  
However, unlikely to ever see constructed play. It dies to the common removal spell, no matter how powerful it is, along with the green flying removal spell and it is an obvious target.  
  
5/5 for limited  
3/3 generally  
Solid 4 card
posts.html:
Comes out turn 2, and does amazing things. In Limited, I pulled 2 of these and I was happy. Perfectly costed for what it is. A great target for scavange. A game winner in a G/B deck.

However, unlikely to ever see constructed play. It dies to the common removal spell, no matter how powerful it is, along with the green flying removal spell and it is an obvious target.

5/5 for limited
3/3 generally
Solid 4 card
